system.effect:
Target: Your Pokémon that has undergone a Purification Ceremony
Effect: Your Pokémon enters Paragon Mode for 5 rounds. Paragon Mode has the following effects:

»» The Pokémon gains +2 to Accuracy checks.
»» The Pokémon deals +10 bonus damage to Shadow-Type Pokémon.
»» Shadow-Type Moves used on the Pokémon are no longer super effective and are instead Resisted.
»» When receiving damage that would cause the Pokémon in Paragon Mode to Faint, they are instead left with 1 HP. This can only happen once per day per Pokémon.
